original_text: Abraham was the father of Isaac, and Isaac the father of Jacob, and Jacob the father of Judah and his brothers,
korean_text: 아브라함이 이삭을 낳고 이삭은 야곱을 낳고 야곱은 유다와 그의 형제들을 낳고

sentences.original_text: Abraham was the father of Isaac
and Isaac the father of Jacob
and Jacob the father of Judah and his brothers
